title: NFL: Conference Championships
author: VD
content_html: I like the Cardinals and the Steelers today. Which isn’t saying much, considering the way in which my picks were 1-3 last week. But I think the Arizona passing game is enough to outshoot a very beatable Eagles team, and while I might have chosen the Ravens if they were healthy, I think Pittsburgh’s offensive line has improved enough to give Roethlisberger time against the depleted Baltimore defense.
content_text: I like the Cardinals and the Steelers today.  Which isn’t saying much, considering the way in which my picks were 1-3 last week.
